name: Android-RobotoTextView
tagline: Implementation of a TextView with native support for all the Roboto fonts on all versions of Android.
body: Android-RobotoTextView ====================== Implementation of a [TextView](http://developer.android.com/reference/android/widget/TextView.html) with native support for all the [Roboto](http://developer.android.com/design/style/typography.html) fonts on all versions of Android. Sample ------ Application is available on Google Play: ![screenshot][1] Compatibility ------------- This library is compatible from API 3 (Android 1.5).
